metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4532 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
offlineimap before 6.3.2 does not check for SSL server certificate validation when "ssl = yes" option is specified which can allow man-in-the-middle attacks.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4532` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

offlineimap - 6.3.3-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: offlineimap package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.3.3-3').
